replies.body:
Wait, wait, waitttttttttttttttttttttttttt...Hold on, wait, You are telling Me, that You are. Let me catch my breath. You are telling me that You are, ugh, you are, this is, ugh. 
You are telling Me that You are Bringing Back DODGE (BBD sponsored by me).
That's insane.
The dodge days were the days I'll cherish forever, until the day I die. And will forever be inside my heart, never forgotten.
Dodge again FTW. Welcome back to the fields of Justice

This is in TFT, not Summoner's Rift. And dodge already existed in TFT in the form of the Yordle origin buff. Dodge is not coming back to Summoner's Rift.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
i do like the neeko thing but, also if there is more items the drop rate should slightly increase.
It already did before hand, I had 3 on a poppy and 1 hit people when ever I crit

you know why people love tft because it's a chill game why would you make it so difficult to play with all thos meta and item change 
you want to unbalence the game like you did in lol 
even ara is boring now tank item to op...
